channel.title: Twitter Api on Michael W. Kearney

item.title: Twitter APIs
item.description: Twitter data gatekeeping Twitter data was already trendy, but the unpresidented 2016 U.S. election has elevated it to a fever pitch. One of the biggest drivers of the trend is the widespread, public availability of Twitter data. Twitter makes much of its user-generated data freely available to the public via Application Program Interfaces (APIs). APIs refer to sets of protocols and procedures for interacting with sites. Twitter maintains several APIs, but in the context of publicly available data collection two, in particular, stand out.
